job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>Description :</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Machine Learning/ML</strong>&nbsp;<strong>Engineer </strong></p><p><strong>Location: Remote, Can be Anywhere, Preferably in West Coast or someone who can work in PST</strong></p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;5+ years of industry experience or a PhD + 2 years industry experience in applied Machine learning.</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Strong coding skills in Python/Java/Scala or equivalent</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with distributed data processing tools like Hive, Spark, Airflow and popular ML frameworks like Tensorflow or Pytorch is preferred</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Solid understanding of engineering best practices and complexities of models in production</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience developing and productionizing machine learning models is a plus</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Spark is a plus</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with distributed data processing tools like Hive, Spark, Airflow is a plus</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Industry experience building end-to-end Machine Learning Infrastructure a bigplus</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><br></p>
